jobs.title: Gen AI Engineer
jobs.shortDescription: Full Stack Technical Lead with Management skills in Python, Generative AI
jobs.description: We are seeking a hands-on Full Stack Web Technical Lead with strong technical management skills to lead and guide development teams in delivering high-quality web applications. This role requires deep expertise in cloud-native architecture, full-stack web development, and hands-on coding, particularly in Python. The ideal candidate will drive estimations, task breakdowns, code reviews, and guide the team to successfully deliver projects. In addition, the role involves leading small-scale POCs, contributing to the technical roadmap, and staying at the forefront of Generative AI application development.
responsibilities: Lead and mentor a team of full-stack developers, providing technical guidance throughout the development lifecycle
Drive task estimation and planning, creating detailed work breakdown structures
Conduct peer reviews of code, ensuring high quality, performance, and security standards
Foster a collaborative and innovative team environment
Build and maintain cloud-native applications using Python, React, and modern frameworks
Deploy applications on cloud platforms using Docker and Kubernetes
Design scalable and secure architectures for web application stacks
Lead cloud-native architecture design and development
Integrate cloud-native services and microservices architectures
Lead small-scale POCs for new technologies and Generative AI applications
Develop web applications leveraging Generative AI and AI models
Stay current with AI trends and implement innovative solutions
Own end-to-end web application delivery from design to deployment
Drive agile development processes and best practices
Implement CI/CD pipelines and testing automation
requirements: 8+ years of experience in full-stack web development, with at least 2 years in a technical lead role
Proficiency in Python and experience in building backend services using frameworks such as Django, Flask, or FastAPI
Strong expertise in front-end development with frameworks like React, Angular, or Vue.js
Solid understanding of databases (SQL/NoSQL) and integration of back-end services with front-end interfaces
Experience with cloud-native architecture, designing and deploying applications on AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud
Experience with Kubernetes, Docker, serverless, and microservices architectures
Deep understanding of full-stack web development from front-end to backend, and cloud infrastructure
Practical experience in developing applications that leverage Generative AI technologies and AI/ML models
Strong experience in leading teams using Agile methodologies, driving continuous delivery and improvement
Proven leadership abilities with strong communication and mentoring skills
Demonstrated problem-solving abilities with focus on scalable, reliable solutions
Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field
preferred: Experience with AI frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Hugging Face
Familiarity with Generative AI models and their application in web development
Experience in building and deploying AI-driven applications
Knowledge of DevOps practices and tools for CI/CD pipelines
Experience with performance optimization and security best practices in web applications
